IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROVIDE CULTURAL AND EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCES FOR CHILDREN THROUGH THEATRE PRODUCTIONS AND CLASSES
IRS990.MissionDescription: provide cultural and educational experiences for children. The theatre offers professional theatre productions geared towards children and their families, as well as classes and workshops that help to develop theatre and acting skills.
IRS990.Description: Live Mainstage productions and productions of new works for youth are two of the major pillars of SCT's Mission. There were 7 shows during the year ended June 30, 2010. Public attendance was 65,974 and school student attendance was 63,170.

Activity2.Description: SCT Drama School and the educational outreach program are year-round activities which provide classes, workshops, residencies, and performance opportunities to students. Drama school registrations last year were 3,339 and outreach served 5,001 students.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Cost of Goods Sold: 29326. Direct Benefit to Donors: 65764. Income reported on SCT Foundation Form 990 : 434429.
Cost of goods sold: 29326. Direct benefit to donors: 65764. Expenses reported on SCT Foundation Form 990: 13733.

Form990ScheduleMPartII.Identifier: Method for Determining Number of Contributors:
Form990ScheduleMPartII.Explanation: The number of contributiors is the number of businesses, individuals or couples that made non-cash donations.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: This year, form 990 will be reviewed and approved by the finance committee prior to filing.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Details: Annually the conflict of interest policy is sent to all board members as part of their Board Governance packet

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Managing Director and Executve Director are under 3 year contracts and the salaries are determined by the executive committee after comparison with other similar organizations and the allowable budget. Other key employee salaries are determined on an annual basis during the budgeting process and are approved by the Finance Committee as part of the budget approval process.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy and financial statements available upon written request.
The audit committee has not changed the process for reviewing the audited financial statements.
